original: dhva dza aa gra ke y'u ra s'a dha nam /
analyzed: dhva dza aa gra ke y'u ra s'a dha nam /

original: rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi sgrub thabs /
analyzed: rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi sgrub thabs /

original: rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Victory Banner Peak Armlet.

original: rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan nag mo zhal gsum phyag bzhi ma /
analyzed: rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan nag mo zhal gsum phyag bzhi ma /
translated: Victory Banner Peak Armlet is black, with three faces and four arms.

original: g-yas yi zhal dmar ba /🔽g-yon gyi zhal ljang gu ral gri dang zhags pa ni g-yas kyi phyag gnyis na'o //
analyzed: g-yas yi zhal dmar ba / g-yon gyi zhal ljang gu ral gri dang zhags pa ni g-yas kyi phyag gnyis na'o //
translated: The right face is red,🔽and the left face is green. The sword and noose are in the two right hands,

original: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i kha tv'a ga dang / 'khor lo ni g-yon gyi phyag gnyis na'o //
analyzed: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i kha tv'a ga dang / 'khor lo ni g-yon gyi phyag gnyis na'o //
translated: and the khaṭvāṅga marked with a vajra and the chakram are in the two left hands.

original: skra kham pa gyen du 'greng ma /🔽thod pa skam po lnga'i phreng bas mgo la brgyan pa /
analyzed: skra kham pa gyen du 'greng ma / thod pa skam po lnga'i phreng bas mgo la brgyan pa /
translated: The tawny hair stands on end.🔽The head is adorned with a garland of five dry skulls.

original: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can zhal mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa /
analyzed: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can zhal mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa /
translated: The skirt is a tiger skin. The face bares fangs.

original: nyi ma'i 'od dang zla ba'i gdan la g-yon brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis gnas pa /
analyzed: nyi ma'i 'od dang zla ba'i gdan la g-yon brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis gnas pa /
translated: The feet are in a left-extended posture on a sun and moon seat.

original: na bza' ser po'i sha 'gag can /
analyzed: na bza' ser po'i sha 'gag can /
translated: He has a yellow silken sash.

original: sa bon ni h'um ste mi bskyod pa'i dbu rgyan can /
analyzed: sa bon ni h'um ste mi bskyod pa'i dbu rgyan can /
translated: His seed syllable is hūṃ, and he has an Akṣobhya crown.

original: 'gro ba'i don du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on him for the sake of migrating beings.
This is the mantra for recitation.

original: rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so //
analyzed: rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so //
translated: The sādhana of the Armlet of the Victory Banner is complete.

original: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang / khams pa lo ts'a ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang / khams pa lo ts'a ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur ba'o//
translated: It was translated by the paṇḍita Amoghavajra and the Khampa translator-editor Gelongma Palmo.
